Posts.Content: Hi Helen, I have a BRCA1 gene classified as having a variation of unknown significance (VUS). Beginning to think it might be significant :)
Posts.Title: Looking for men who have had breast cancer to help us

Posts.Content: I'm a guy from Australia two years post treatment for breast cancer and currently NED. I've just been diagnosed a medium-grade prostate cancer with a Gleason score of 7 and a stage T2 to 3 and am booked in for a robotic prostatectomy in a couple of months.
Posts.Title: Looking for men who have had breast cancer to help us
